name: Skyrock Blog Importer
author: CÃ©dric Boverie

sections.description:
The Skyrock Blog Importer will import the following content from an online Skyrock Blog :

  • Posts
  • Tags
  • Comments
  • Small definition images
  • Videos and some gadgets
sections.installation:
1. Upload skyrock-blog-importer folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to the Tools -> Import screen, click on ‘Skyrock Blog’ and follow the instructions.
sections.changelog:
0.2

  • Update to support new version of Skyrock
  • Import of tags

0.1

  • Initial release

short_description: Import posts, tags, comments, images and videos from a Skyrock Blog (a french blog platform).
